gameDescription: A V1 Picaro Test-Game, in which the leaf can be used on oneself

events.message: You quaff the potion. You now have the ability to SEE THROUGH TIME.
You rub the leaf all over your face, take a second look at it, then mutter to yourself, "Leaves of three... let them be..."
The leaf dissolves in the flask.

rooms.name: The Lab
rooms.description: You stand facing a scientist's workspace, strewn with strange apparatus.

items.name: Leaf
look: It's readdish, with glints of gold when turned in the light

look: It's a teal liquid in an erelenmeyer flask.
